amendment.description: To ensure that current prescription drug benefits to medicare-eligible enrollees in the Federal Employees Health Benefits Program will not be diminished.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 979 withdrawn in Senate.

Amendment SA 979 proposed by Senator Akaka. (consideration: CR S8330-8331; text: CR S8330) To ensure that current prescription drug benefits to medicare-eligible enrollees in the Federal Employees Health Benefits Program will not be diminished.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 979 proposed by Senator Akaka.
